title: Remembering NFL coaching legend Don Shula (1930-2020)
description:
On Monday, the NFL lost one of its all-time greats, as Don Shula passed away at the age of 90. Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and Jamey Eisenberg to remember the league's all-time wins leader and 2-time Super Bowl champion. Pete and Jamey both grew up in South Florida and spent time covering Shula and the Dolphins and were able to share unique perspectives on the legend. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @PriscoCBS, @JameyEisenberg
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and Jamey Eisenberg to remember the league's all-time wins leader and 2-time Super Bowl champion. Pete and Jamey both grew up in South Florida and spent time covering Shula and the Dolphins and were able to share unique perspectives on the legend.
